text:
Hey team, looking to work with Riley Evans for Big W. 
            Budget is approx $25,767 - need 1 x Twitter post, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Instagram post, 3 x Brand ambassador content, 3 x 5-minute review. 3 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 12 months. Start date: October 2025.
